Name: Perennial Peony
Description: A large flower consisting of layers of delicate petals.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una flor grande que consta de capas de pétalos delicados.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 섬세한 꽃잎의 층으로 구성된 큰 꽃.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine große Blume, die aus Schichten zarter Blütenblätter besteht.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une grande fleur composée de couches de pétales délicats.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Egy nagy virág, amely finom szirmok rétegeiből áll.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Un grande fiore costituito da strati di petali delicati.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 繊細な花びらの層からなる大きな花。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma grande flor que consiste em camadas de pétalas delicadas.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Большой цветок, состоящий из слоев нежных лепестков.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Narin yaprak katmanlarından oluşan büyük bir çiçek.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一朵由多层精致花瓣组成的大花。
